so first
generally about passive sentences
use when the action
or the condition
is more important

important than the person doing the
action okay so we don't want to focus on
like me if i do an action we don't want

action that's more important sometimes
we use passive to do this
second
we use passive when you don't know
who is going to do the action when you

this is very useful when you're talking

don't know
who is going to help you at the company
